documentation.text: @notice Flattened quote parameters - no nested structs for gas optimization
@notice Flattened batch quote parameters - no nested structs for gas optimization
@notice Base contract for data adapters that normalize data from different sources

@notice Universal data adapter that automatically handles price inversion
 @dev Ensures all prices are returned as asset0 per asset1 (e.g., USDC per WETH)

documentation.text: @notice Processes double price data (spot, twap) or (spot, timestamp)

@notice Automatically detects and corrects price orientation
 @dev Uses heuristics to determine if prices should be inverted
